So far as possible, let the child from his earliest years be placed where this wonderful lesson book shall be open 
                                                                           101
before him. Let him behold the glorious scenes painted by the great Master Artist upon the shifting canvas of the heavens, let him become acquainted with the wonders of earth and sea, let him watch the unfolding mysteries of the changing seasons, and, in all His works, learn of the Creator.
